doc.title: Just Another Firework
doc.plot: Would you let the end of the world spoil your holiday plans? This smart London couple will have none of it. Venice has been destroyed and Paris is occupied by the same army that invaded Barcelona, so how about a change of plans and do a safari trip to Africa instead of a European city break? There is only one problem: their neighbor's, Cassandra, interrupting their cozy winter evening with a reminder of the relentless bombs that keep falling over London.
